9122a54e-96ab-4a5a-9f63-24a44c27df14.name: VMware Certified Design Expert - Network Virtualization 2022

badge_template_activities.title: VCAP-NV Deploy 2022
VCAP-NV Design 2022

Develop a customer-facing enterprise design and deployment plan and strategy, including comprehensive logical and physical models and implementation, installation, operating and testing guidance. Time spent on average exceeds 200 hours.
Submit the design portfolio that includes all aspects of a full strategic and deployable network and security virtualization design and have it approved by a three-person panel.
Defend the design in-person to a three-person panel and validate technical, design and critical thinking skills.

ab31dffe-a202-4879-9c6c-3148eab52041.description: The VMware Certified Professional - Cloud Operations certification validates your ability to install, configure, administer, and operate a multi-cloud infrastructure using vRealize Operations, vRealize Log Insight, and vRealize Suite Lifecycle Manager. These skills demonstrate your ability to optimize and troubleshoot your data center and cloud infrastructure whilst providing operational visibility and transparency.
ab31dffe-a202-4879-9c6c-3148eab52041.name: VMware Certified Professional - Cloud Operations 2023

badge_template_activities.title: (Recommended) Gain experience with VMware vRealize Operations v8.6 , VMware vRealize Log Insight v8.8 and VMware vRealize Suite Lifecycle Manager v8.8
Attend one of the required training course
Pass the 2V0-32.22 VMware Cloud Operations 8.x Professional Exam

22df69ba-5343-40b7-8bb8-a08d935902f5.description: The VMware Certified Technical Associate - Security certification validates an earner has knowledge of endpoint security and can work with VMware Carbon Black Cloud solutions. 22df69ba-5343-40b7-8bb8-a08d935902f5.name: VMware Certified Technical Associate - Security 2023

badge_template_activities.title: (Recommended) Complete VMware Endpoint Security: Core Technical Skills training
Gain experience with VMware Carbon Black Cloud solutions
Pass the VMware Security Technical Associate 1V0-91.22 exam
